name: My Friend Cthulhu
description:
My Friend Cthulhu is an Arcade Android Game with a Lovecraftian Theme, inspired by games like Cooking Mama and Wario Ware.

The Game was developed as a final project for a Mobile Game Development course.

It features 16 original minigames, with 3 difficulty levels specifically tuned, uses gyroscopes and audio, and 3 different play modes: recipes, endless, training.

The repo of the project is freely accessibile, the Unity project is available here

https://gitlab.com/Giovanni.Carnovale/Mobile_Finale

Game Developed by:

Giovanni Carnovale
Alessandro Carattoli
Andrea Alcaras
Andrea Squillante
